Category ve subcategory tabloları için:


CREATE TABLE category (categoryId SMALLINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, categoryName VARCHAR(40), PRIMARY KEY(categoryId));

CREATE TABLE subcategory (subcategoryId SMALLINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, subcategoryName VARCHAR(40), PRIMARY KEY(subcategoryId));

CREATE TABLE category_subcategory (categoryId SMALLINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, subcategoryId SMALLINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(categoryId, subcategoryId) );
